name: Guardian Greaves
lore: One of many holy instruments constructed to honor the Omniscience.

descriptions.name: Mend
descriptions.description: Restores 250 health and 160 mana to nearby allies, and removes most negative effects from the caster.Radius: 900Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

descriptions.name: Guardian Aura
descriptions.description: Provides nearby allies with 4 health regeneration and 2 bonus armor. If an allied hero's health falls below 20%, they receive 15 health regeneration and 15 armor.

notes: The aura boost only applies to heroes.
